requestParams.name: page_no
requestParams.desc: 页数(至少从第一页开始)

requestParams.name: page_size
requestParams.desc: 每页条数(最大值为每页20条数据)

requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源(调用方和有赞约定的值)

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['retail_source']="RENWOXING"
params['page_size']=5
params['page_no']=1

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.category.query', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'RENWOXING', 'page_size' => '5', 'page_no' => '1', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

errorCodes.solution: 确认有符合条件的数据

3.0.0.errorResponseDemo: {"error_response":{"msg":"参数 token 无效","code":40010,"sub_msg":"token无效，该token不存在或已过期","sub_code":10000,"sub_data":""}}
